Element Selector

p { color: blue; }

Class Selector

.highlight { background-color: yellow; }
<p class="highlight">This is highlighted</p>

ID Selector

#header { color: white; }
<div id="header">Header</div>

Combining Selectors

/* All p elements */
p { color: blue; }
/* p with class active */
p.active { font-weight: bold; }
